patterns.name: service_extraction
patterns.description: Extract semantic groups of methods into separate service classes
patterns.before_pattern: Large monolithic class with mixed responsibilities
patterns.after_pattern: Multiple focused service classes with single responsibility
conditions: Methods can be grouped by semantic similarity

patterns.name: import_fixing
patterns.description: Automatically fix non-existent imports and add fallbacks
patterns.after_pattern: # Removed non-existent import or added fallback
conditions: Module path does not exist in codebase

patterns.name: logging_standardization
patterns.description: Standardize logging variable names across codebase
conditions: Codebase uses mixed logging variable names
Majority of files use 'logger' instead of 'LOG'

patterns.name: owner_proxy_pattern
patterns.description: Implement Owner Proxy pattern for state delegation
patterns.before_pattern: Direct state access and method calls
conditions: Multiple classes need access to shared state

import_fixes.replacement: # Removed non-existent import or added fallback
